meanings.sent1: The forest creatures moved darkling through the night.
meanings.sent2: She walked darkling through the dimly lit alley.
meanings.sent3: The cat stealthily crept darkling towards its prey.
meanings.sent4: The secrets of the night whispered darkling in her ears.
meanings.sent5: The stars shone darkling in the moonless sky.

meanings.sent1: The darkling figure disappeared into the shadows.
meanings.sent2: The darkling clouds obscured the moonlight.
meanings.sent3: The darkling ninja silently slipped past the guards.
meanings.sent4: His darkling intentions sent shivers down her spine.
meanings.sent5: The darkling forest was filled with mysterious sounds.

meanings.sent1: The sky turned darkling as the sun set.
meanings.sent2: The darkling horizon signaled the end of the day.
meanings.sent3: The darkling evening brought a sense of calm.
meanings.sent4: The darkling twilight painted the sky in hues of purple.
meanings.sent5: The darkling dusk enveloped the landscape in shadows.
